"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55591e686368721bdd101900#post_55591e686368721bdd101900
Alright, the Suicide Squad is basically a group of people (usually super villains) that the US Government hires to do a single mission. In return for doing this mission the government expunges all previous charges against them. However of they fail the Government disavows any and all knowledge about them or their mission. The catch? The mission usually has very low odds if success. Hence the name "Suicide Squad."

topics.body:
I have a dumb question: why are the majority of hipsters such drama whores?

They tried causing shit in the early 2000's with anime, they've been causing shit with gamers, they cause shit with comic fans, they cause shit with furries, they've been causing shit with bronies, etc, etc. Why is it that 95% of hipsters are the "fuck you geeks!  This is our fandom now!  If you don't like that we're taking it from you get out!" kind.  The premise of a hipster is a good idea in that trying out underground subcultures to see what is interesting is a good way to expand your horizon, but 95% of the time they scream and yell and cry about how it's not "fair" that geeks control fandoms and constantly beg for money.

I legitimately don't understand why someone that how a group around trying new subcultures became a fandom about trying to cause as much drama as humanly possible and whenever a fandom refuses to be assimilated they try to destroy the fandom.

If you ask me that fandom needs to be renamed to the "e-begging" fandom, cause that is pretty much what they do.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
